department: Department of Employment and Social Development (EDSC)
short_summary: purchase of office furniture for Employment and Social Development Canada in Longueuil, Quebec
description: Request for Proposal for the procurement of office furniture.
duration_in_months: How long is the contract supposed to last?
full_summary: # Government Tender Announcement ## **Title** EF937-231914 - Purchase of Office Furniture for ESDC Longueuil [Authorized languages](#authorized-languages) ## **Reference Number** WS3843084906-Doc3843638681 ## **Tender Information** ### Notice Type This is a **Request for Proposal** (RFP) for the provision of office furniture services. ### Tender Status **Expired (Closed)** ### Closing Date and Time The tender closed on **February 23, 2023** at **14:00:00 EST**. ### Contact Information * Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) * Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada * Contact Person: Corine Lavoie, email: [corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) ### Procurement Details #### Product/Service Category * Unspsc: Workstations and office packages (56111500) and Desking systems (56112200) * Category: Office furniture and equipment ## **Bid Submission Requirements** All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on or before the closing date. Late bids will be declared non-responsive. # Authorized Languages The official language of the Government of Canada is English, but all services will also be available in French. # Related Documents * [Notice URL](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15244932?extsite=MTUyNDQ5MzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) * [Annex A: Request for Proposal Details](#annex-a) ### On the following page, you will find the detailed specifications for the RFP. - **Tender Description**: The purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture to Longueuil, Quebec. You can review the detailed bid submission requirements in the request for proposal document. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact the contracting entity. Thank you for your participation in this tender process. Good luck! I hope this is as good as the gov releases them. Return to MarktheWriter if more work is required.
